column5: does anybody have a sight or some rough info on what the weather is gona be like this fall? i cant seem to find much info for southern/southeastern ontario a link would be great thanks!
Here you go....  http://www.weatheroffice.gc.ca/saisons/index_e.html  I think the 2 to 4 month one goes out to October only....the longer range ones are not on there anymore.
